participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Fun-loving and sociable, Alex is eager to make the most of his free time.
participant_1.background: i work took i have a part time job at burger king. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. they're constantly on my back. i just want to have fun with my friends.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and caring, Emily has a passion for music and helping others.
participant_2.background: my father played violin professionally. i'm a piano teacher on the side. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i volunteer at the homeless shelter.
